rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0002
rows.name:
I thought I told you never to disturb me in this chamber.
What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Councilor Luxaar—this is Mercenary Warlord Ga Jiarg,
former prince of the kingdom of Wroth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0006
rows.name:
It is with a heavy heart and deep regret
that I must report to you[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0007
rows.name:
that the Wrothian people are unable to carry out
your mission to annihilate the human race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0008
rows.name:
We realize this means we will no longer enjoy
the benevolence of Ganglion patronage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
So be it. The Wrothian people will make our way
as an independent mercenary force, effective immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
We look forward to settling our debt with you
on some future battlefield. Until then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09090100_MSG0012
rows.name:
I should have known those ungrateful RATS
would bite the hand that feeds them![ST:wait ]
